plot: Takumi Harada moves to a mountain town in Okayama prefecture during the spring break before he enters middle school due to his father's job transfer. Takumi is a pitcher, and after the moves he loses faith in his own talent, when suddenly his classmate Kō Nagakura appears in front of him. Kō has a strong desire to form a "battery" (a combination of a pitcher and catcher) with Takumi.
opening_theme: "Itsuka no Jibun" (My Someday Self) by anderlust
ending_theme: "Ashita, Haru ga Kitara" (If Spring Comes Tomorrow) by anderlust
"Wakamono no Subete" (若者のすべて) by anderlust
